docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
README.md     # Introduction to the repo.

docs.title: Mars Imagery
docs.text:
Here is how you can load in imagery of Mars to display easily in python:

CRISM ImageryHiRISE ImageryCTXCaSSIS

Warnings

Never load CRISM imagery, you would have to be insane to want to work with this data.

from n2n4m.io import load_image
image = load_image("insert_filepath_here.img")

Data Viewer: link Target Selection Wish: link

docs.title: About my site
docs.text:
Warning

Don't use this site, its trash.

Quote

"Reproduceability is optional, not a requirement" - Myself

Danger

Are you sure you want to jump down this rabbit hole?

import pandas as pd # (1)!
df = pd.read_json("MyFilepath")
  1. Convention

docs.title: Bugs
docs.text:
Bug in PythonBug 2

This one is a big un. 

import n2n4m # this is convention not required
raise TypeError("Why would you do that?")

This is annoying but really you're a dumbass if you cause this.
